question: 脳みそ
sourceMnemonic: Do you know <ja>みそ</ja> Soup and how miso goes in it? This is that miso. It's soft and strange feeling. Now, your <kanji>brain</kanji> <kanji>miso</kanji>, that's your <vocabulary>brains</vocabulary> or your <vocabulary>gray matter</vocabulary>. Essentially, if someone cuts your head open with a katana, this is perhaps what would come out.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Reading is just what you learned with the kanji. Just use your <ja>脳</ja> a bit and it should be easy.
